description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) in GNU Savane v.3.12 and before allows a remote attacker to delete arbitrary files via crafted input to the trackers_data_delete_file function.

La referencia directa a objetos inseguros (IDOR) en GNU Savane v.3.12 y anteriores permite a un atacante remoto eliminar archivos arbitrarios mediante una entrada manipulada en la función trackers_data_delete_file.
